name: Ghost in the Graveyard (M0RT0R16)
description: As you come to consciousness, you find yourself in a place that feels disjointed from the reality you have grown so accustomed to throughout your life. While you make your way through the winding passageways of this twisting expanse, you find you can’t recall how you got here. No one ever does, not really. Many children have found themselves in this vast unknowable labyrinth, and all have perished. If you help them, they may help you in return. One thing is for sure though, the only way out is to keep going forward. Will you escape from this terrible place? Or will you just become another ghost in the graveyard?
